Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.string.joiner.formatter

Classes for formatting values.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Formatter2 Formats a value to a {code String}.
 

Class Summary
AbstractStringFormatter2 Base class for formatters that use String.format(String, Object...).
CountingStringFormatter2 Formats a value using String.format() with an incrementing counter.
DefaultFormatter2 Formats a value using String.valueOf(Object).
PathFormatter2 Formats file and directory paths to distinguish between relative and absolute paths.
StringFormatter2 Formats a value using String.format().
 

Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.string.joiner.formatter Description

Classes for formatting values.

This package is a part of the open-source Papaya library.
